welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Nova Milanese, Italy! Known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network by providing their email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'MXP Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
